welcome_message_body: Welcome to Boston, where the historic charm and vibrant culture collide! Known for its rich history, world-class museums, and delicious seafood, we invite you to explore and savor all that this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Boracay sa Cateel Restaurant
restaurants.description: Boracay sa Cateel Restaurant is a diner located in the city.

restaurants.name: Boracay sa Cateel
restaurants.description: Boracay sa Cateel is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: burger engine
restaurants.description: burger engine is a burger joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: Oriental Food Court
restaurants.description: Oriental Food Court is a filipino restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: edwards grill

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights with some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving mainly international flights with some domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The international terminal at Logan International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the 'LoganWifi' network and accept the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lawrence Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
